cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 4, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6386, an act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 450 West Schaumburg Road in Schaumburg, Illinois, as the “Veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan Memorial Post Office Building

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KRISHNAMOORTHI:
H.R. 6386.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H78]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 450 West Schaumburg Road in Schaumburg, Illinois, as the "Veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan Memorial Post Office Building".
